synopsis.text: Due to a failed romance and mounting financial woes, Retsuko, a red panda, finds solace in a virtual reality game and the affections of a virtual unicorn, Seiya. Her excessive in-game spending and an unfortunate car accident leave her in dire financial straits. To pay off her debts, Retsuko takes on a second job as an accountant for an underground idol group, managed by the owner of the car she hit, Hyoudou. As she struggles to balance her new job and her personal life, Retsuko begins to question if her mundane office life is truly what she wants. Will Retsuko be able to overcome her challenges and find happiness, or will she resign herself to a life of monotony? Only time will tell in this latest season of Aggretsuko.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
